conversion_verification.notes: Render shows extruded walls with visible thickness, an elevated/isometric camera, and a cutaway roof/ceiling exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion (height/thickness), clear floor-vs-wall separation, good corner geometry and clean cutaway; minor simplification at some wall caps/edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency largely match (activity/living left, balcony bottom-left, bath/WC central, bedrooms to right/bottom). Some proportional differences and simplified internal joinery (robes/linen/recess) and door placement details are not perfectly faithful.

interior_elements.notes: Beds in bedrooms, living seating and TV, bathroom fixtures present. Furniture is mostly in correct rooms with reasonable scale; some rooms are simplified relative to the 2D plan labeling (e.g., 'activity' not explicitly differentiated).

visual_clarity.notes: Readable walls/floors/openings and clean presentation; lighting is adequate. Some openings/frames and interior partitions are slightly ambiguous due to uniform materials and simplified detailing.

detected_errors.description: Minor-to-moderate proportional/layout simplifications (e.g., robe/linen/recess partitions and some wall segment lengths) reduce strict fidelity to the 2D plan.
Some door/window/opening placements and sizes appear simplified or not perfectly aligned to the 2D plan’s exact locations.
Uniform materials and simplified trim reduce clarity of certain internal partitions/opening details.

summary: A true cutaway 3D model with strong fundamentals and largely correct room layout, but with noticeable simplification of internal partitions and some opening/proportion mismatches versus the 2D plan.
